metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15569 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Redmine before 3.2.8, 3.3.x before 3.3.5, and 3.4.x before 3.4.3, XSS exists in app/helpers/queries_helper.rb via a multi-value field with a crafted value that is mishandled during rendering of an issue list.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.4.4-1
redmine-mysql - 3.4.4-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.4.4-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.4.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-1').
